trans-unit.source: The SoapServerType class represents the type on which the XML Web service is based.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerType"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Type> on which this XML Web service is based.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServiceProtocols"></xref> value that specifies the transmission protocols that are used to decrypt data sent in the XML Web service request.
Returns the duplicate <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref> associated with the specified key.
The key associated with the desired duplicate <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
The duplicate <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref> associated with the specified key.
Returns the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref> associated with the specified key.
The key associated with the desired <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref> associated with the specified key.
Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether SOAP data transmissions sent to and from this XML Web service are encoded by default.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if SOAP data transmissions sent to and from this XML Web service are encoded by default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace to which this XML Web service belongs.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace to which this XML Web service belongs.

Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether SOAP messages that are routed to this XML Web service are routed based on the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP header.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if SOAP messages that are routed to this XML Web service are routed based on the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP header; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
